description: This schema is used for verification of JSON objects used for creation of Automation Object Templates.
title: Automation Module Type Definitions

___[A-Za-z0-9]+.description: Definition of the Trigger Module Type.
___[A-Za-z0-9]+.title: Trigger Module Type

___description.description: A brief description of what the Trigger is and for what it is used.
___description.title: Trigger Designation

___type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class.

___tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

___output.description: Output object of the Trigger used to transfer data to other modules of the Rule.
___output.title: Trigger Output

___[A-Za-z0-9]+.description: Property for configuring Rule or Module.
___[A-Za-z0-9]+.title: Configuration Property

___options.description: List of definitions of the parameter for static selection.
___options.title: Configuration Parameter Options

___type.description: Property declaring data type of the Configuration Parameter.
___type.title: Configuration Parameter Type

___max.description: Maximum value of numeric types, maximal length for strings, maximal number selected options.
___max.title: Configuration Parameter Maximum Allowed Value

___required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.
___required.title: Required Configuration Parameter

___readOnly.description: Specifies whether the value is read-only.
___readOnly.title: Readable Configuration Parameter

___label.description: A human understandable label of the Configuration Parameter.
___label.title: Configuration Parameter Label

___min.description: Minimum value of numeric types, minimal length for strings, minimal number selected options.
___min.title: Configuration Parameter Minimum Allowed Value

___multiple.description: Specifies whether multiple selections of options are allowed.
___multiple.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter

___description.description: A human understandable description of the Configuration Parameter.
___description.title: Configuration Parameter Description

___step.description: A constant value for increasing/decreasing numeric types
___step.title: Configuration Parameter Step

___value.description: Declaring a value for the Configuration Parameter in case of system context.
___value.title: Configuration Parameter Value

___filterCriteria.description: Criteria for dynamic selection of values.
___filterCriteria.title: Configuration Parameter Filter

___context.description: Serves to determine how to treat the value of the Configuration Parameter.
___context.title: Configuration Parameter Context

___defaultValue.description: Declaring a default value for the Configuration Parameter if missing.
___defaultValue.title: Configuration Parameter Default Value

___pattern.description: Regular script for subscribing text types.
___pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern

___config.description: Used to configure the Trigger. Contains objects describing Configuration Properties.
___config.title: Trigger Configurations

___label.description: Short(one word) user friendly description of the Trigger Module Type.
___label.title: Trigger Label

___triggers.description: Container for Trigger Templates used to create the Trigger Modules of the Rule.
___triggers.title: Trigger Templates

oneOf.description: Contains definition of the Composite Trigger Module Type.
oneOf.title: Composite Trigger Module Type

___triggers.description: Contains definitions of the Trigger Modules of the Trigger Composition.
___triggers.title: Trigger Modules

items.description: Defines the fact which triggers the Rule execution.
items.title: Trigger Module

___type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Trigger Composition. Must be unique in scope of concrete Rule definition.
___type.title: Trigger Module Type

___config.description: Used to configure the Trigger Composition. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.
___config.title: Trigger Configurations

___id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.
___id.title: Trigger uid

___description.description: A brief description of what the Composite is and for what it is used.
___description.title: Composite Module Type Description.

___type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class.

___tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

___output.description: Output object of the Trigger used to transfer data to other modules of the Rule.
___output.title: Trigger Output

___pattern.description: Regular script for subscribing text types.
___pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern

___config.description: Used to configure the Composition Module Type. Contains objects describing Configuration Properties.
___config.title: Composition Module Type Configurations

___tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Composition Module Type. They help to classify the templates and allow them to be found.
___tags.title: Composition Module Type Tags

oneOf.title: Composite Action Module Type

___actions.description: Contains definitions of Action Modules of the Action Composition.
___actions.title: Action Modules

items.description: Defines an action which has to be executed by the Rule.
items.title: Action Module

___type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Action. Must be unique in scope of concrete Rule definition.
___type.title: Action Module Type

___output.description: Contains pairs of Output name and Output reference. The reference defines what part of a complex data has to be used as value of this output.
___output.title: Action Output

___config.description: Used to configure the Action. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.
___config.title: Action Configurations

___input.description: Contains pairs of Input name and Output reference in format - ModuleID : OutputName.
___input.title: Action Input

___id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.
___id.title: Action Id

___type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class.

___tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

___required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.
___required.title: Required Input

___defaultValue.description: Specifies the value if the Input is not required and is missing.
___defaultValue.title: Input Default Value

___input.description: Input object of the Action used for binding an Output objects of other modules in order to receive data.
___input.title: Action Input

oneOf.description: Contains definition of the Composite Condition Module Type.
oneOf.title: Composite Condition Module Type

___description.description: A brief description of what the Composite is and for what it is used.
___description.title: Composite Module Type Description.

items.description: Defines the condition which permit to proceed with the Rule execution.
items.title: Condition Module
